channel.title: Can Connect To Servers? :S
channel.description: Hey, i got a problem... i cant connect to any servers it always says error connecting to servers i tried ALL!! of the servers on Status List..... could someone tell me why? pls... i rly need to know cause, its like months since i last logged on a server... exept of my own.. :'( WILL PAY 10K IN REAL RUNESCAPE :P . Oh And Im Using FrugooScape Client :)

item.title: Can Connect To Servers? :S

item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Umm, use the MoparScape client. =x
Yes, Frugoo did make his to run them, but give it a shot.
